entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
